Help me fix this I keeps on saying PVP.net kernel has stopped working

replies.body: I have the exact same problem and exact same log. I tried everything; reinstalling, running as administrator, deleting/disabling antivirus, reinstalling graphics driver, installing LoL on different OS (I use Windows 8.1, tried on Windows 7 on the same PC, didn't work), Googled everything pretty much and been trying for past 6 hours. It was working fine until last night (with anti virus on silent mode and running it as admin), but stopped working since this morning. Let me know if you find a solution or if anyone has any ideas.
